episodes.title: The Cult of Hating Women
episodes.description: Thank you for 20,000 subs and over 1 Million views on YouTube!! ➖➖➖ Our guest today is Leslie, an incredibly brave survivor who joined a deeply patriarchal cult when she was just a teenager. This cult is known as “The Message”, and was founded by Christian minister and faith healer, William Branham. Branham greatly influenced notorious cult leaders like Jim Jones and Paul Schäfer and inspired other fanatical groups like the deadly Malindi cult ,which I covered in another episode. Out of all of the harmful practices Branham taught, he reserved his most vile thoughts and teachings, for women. Leslie discusses the profound physical and emotional toll she suffered for years and how she was repeatedly forced into sexual activities despite having serious medical conditions that made intimacy extremely hazardous to her health. She also reveals tragic details of how her abuser deliberately disregarded these medical risks, prioritizing his own desires over her well-being and safety. This conversation contains mature themes and may be difficult for some listeners. However, it sheds light on the often-hidden world of religious cults, purity culture, and the lasting impact they have on people, especially women. ➖➖➖ Thanks for listening and be sure to follow us here and on YouTube for more culty content: https://www.youtube.com/@KendraLeeBryan Join our Patreon for exclusive content, community chats and early release episodes: patreon.com/TheAntiCultClub Browse our website for merch! https://kendraleebryan.com/ #cult #jimjones #williambranham #faithhealer # --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/support

episodes.title: I Escaped A Cult TWICE
episodes.description:
Once upon a time I was raised in a cult but I didn't just escape it, I escaped it TWICE.
[Cult]ure Shock is usually a place for other ex-cult kids to share their own stories but today I'M IN THE HOT SEAT. You may have heard some of my story before but no one’s ever heard it all until THIS crossover episode today I’ve waited months to share.

Merch is the BEST WAY to support my videos and this channel. Your selfless support means THE  ABSOLUTE WORLD to me!! *Merch here* https://kendraleebryan.com/ 
---
Rachel Bernstein is a Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist from Los Angeles, California who has specialized in cult intervention and re-acclimation for over 30 years. Rachel serves on the advisory board of the International Cultic Studies Association and has worked with the Department of Justice providing support to cult survivors. You may recognize her from popular cult documentaries like Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult or the Netflix series How To Become A Cult Leader. She's also made many media appearances as a cult expert on CNN, MSNBC, BBC, NPR, Bloomberg, and many other major news outlets. Rachel is the host of IndoctriNATION: A weekly podcast covering cults, manipulators, and protecting yourself from systems of control where she has interviewed hundreds of cult survivors, journalists, and experts. Her webinars and video lectures are available on her website at: www.rachelbernsteintherapy.com
Follow Rachel here:
Podcast: https://linktr.ee/indoctrination

episodes.title: Narconon: Scientology's Deadly Drug Rehab
episodes.description: Narconon is Scientology's version of a dr*g rehab program...but make it undercover, controversial, and with a dark and ugly history. In my conversation with Jenni, a former Scientologist, we dive into her personal experiences and the unsettling practices that define Narconon. From bizarre detox methods to questionable psychological techniques, we explore how this program operates under the guise of helping those struggling with addiction. What really struck me were the stories Jenni shared about the dangers lurking behind Narconon’s seemingly holistic approach. It’s a conversation what we THINK we know about rehab and raises serious questions about safety and ethics. And you're interested in these types of topics, be sure to check out some other episodes for more deep dives into the crazy world of cults, crime, and crooked culture. episodes.description: Have you ever found yourself in a situation where you suddenly realized you were part of a cult? In this video, we delve into real-life stories shared on Reddit where individuals recount the chilling moment they realized they were involved in a cult. From subtle signs to shocking revelations, these eye-opening accounts shed light on the grip cults can have on unsuspecting individuals. Let's explore the red flags and warning signs that helped these people break free from the grip of manipulation and control. episodes.title: Exposing Diddy's Sex Cult And The Suspicious Death Of Mica Miller
episodes.description:
Diddy and JP Miller are in the hotseat tonight. Let's look at the evidence we have so far...

Is Sean “Diddy” Combs responsible for running a celebrity s*x cult? He's currently under federal investigation following numerous lawsuits alleging claims of SA and more. The music mogul has not been arrested as of yet, but both his Los Angeles and Miami homes were raided by Homeland Security and the allegations continue to roll in. 

Mica Miller was found deceased on April 27th near Myrtle Beach 48 hours after filing for divorce from her estranged husband and pastor, John Paul Miller. JP's behavior has been nothing but suspicious following her de^th and Mica's friends and family are calling for a deeper investigation into her case. We look at church footage of JP the day after Mica was found and also hear heartbreaking warning signs from Mica's own mouth. 
----------------
One of my absolute favorite ex- cult friends (Jess S.) joins me today to talk everything culty including Hollywood mega churches, celebrities with ties to religious cults and other culty rabbit trails that need to be exposed. 

You can watch Jess' own story about leaving the Pentecostal Holiness cult here https://youtu.be/uqmtMYr9Njg
---------------

episodes.title: Twin Flames Universe- Cult Of Love
episodes.description: The Twin Flames Universe is not your everyday cult-it's a Cult of Love. I spent 6 months inside their private Facebook group and saw firsthand how easy is for people to fall head over heels for false prophets and promises. Is the 2nd coming of Christ (and his wife) psychologically manipulating good people in an online cult? I'm convinced they are. Documentaries referenced: Escaping Twin Flames (Netflix) https://www.netflix.com/title/81615919 Desperately Seeking Soulmate (Prime) https://www.amazon.com/Desperately-Seeking-Soulmate-Escaping-Universe/dp/B0CG7C7N1C All other sources can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14K1bekbmFh1Kmgf7uuvIKi2nTDBGRJOCtpU0XFCSO70/edit?usp=sharing Join the Anti-Cult Club on Patreon: patreon.com/TheAntiCultClub #cult #twinflames #cultsurvivor #truecrimepodcast --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/message

episodes.title: Student Victims: Justice for Jodie
episodes.description: Two major industries make up 70% of all losses related to CSA. Equally upsetting is that you're handing children over to those industries every single day. Religious institutions and schools are the two major places your children are supposed to be safe and protected yet they’re the exact places kids are targeted by adults AND peers. Jodie joins me from South Africa to tell her story of complete injustice and share the determination she has to regain her freedom. ------ Join the fun with me on Patreon for exclusive content! patreon.com/TheAntiCultClub All sources used for today's episode can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gFqdjOMraLTts0J04VsxCVEuppocbSdjbxvegEqlOnI/edit?usp=sharing #cults #cultpodcast #cultsurvivor #truecrimepodcast

episodes.title: Baby Factory: Inside A Polygamist Cult
episodes.description: This episode made me cry not only as we filmed but again as I was editing...it hit me THAT hard. Can you imagine growing up in a family with a dozen siblings, hundreds of cousins, and a cult leader GRANDPA?! Some people don't have to imagine it because they LIVED it. "Hugh" asked to remain anonymous so I've changed his name and blurred his identity in order to protect him and his family's identity. Cleanse your palette with this light hearted episode "I Can Make Anyone A Cult Leader" https://youtu.be/-JdumPF_cXE Deep Dive with Ex-Mormon Mekael: https://youtu.be/1V6h7goZzZE --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/support
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

There are certain components every cult leader needs to master if they want to secure a spot among the notorious. This video teaches you the first 4 steps to becoming the best (worst) cult leader in history. Welcome to Cult Leader University! #cult #cultleader #cultsurvivor #rts #fundiefriday #cptsd #truecrime --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/support

episodes.title: Scientology: The Religious Mafia
episodes.description: If there was a competition for the "Ultimate Cult" this one would have my vote. The Church of Scientology checks every cult box from exploitation and silencing members, to forced labor and sleep deprivation. Jenni grew up as a Scientologist, just like her parents, and shared so many shocking and eye opening details about the secretive religion that I'd never heard before. Check out Jenni's page for more of her story and hear her interview other cult survivors: https://www.youtube.com/@CultsandAtheists For inquiries and submissions, send an email to kendraleebryan@gmail.com #cults #cultsurvivor #cultleader #scientology #rts #churchofscientology #truecrime #ptsd #horrorstories --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/support

episodes.title: Craziest Doomsday Predictions In History
episodes.description: Apocalypse, Doomsday, The 2nd Coming, Judgement Day... No matter what you call it, they all have a 100% failure rate. Interestingly, people continue to fall for these scams no matter how many times the prophecies fail. Fear is an incredibly effective motivator. The doomsday predictions in this video are absolutely WILD. It's crazy to think people have fallen for some of the really insane claims. Unfortunately, people have lost millions of dollars because of them and some have even lost their LIVES. Live~Laugh~Leave A Cult Contact or story submission: kendraleebryan@gmail.com Ways to support my channel: Venmo: https://venmo.com/u/thekendrab Paypal: paypal.me/thekendrab Cashapp: $thekendrab OR Join my Anti-Cult Club channel to get access to exclusive perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqfiV3C_ALO-kdynhhm876Q/join #doomsday #apocalypse #cultsurvivor #cultleader #falseprophet #cults #truecrimecommunity --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/kendra-bryan/support

episodes.title: Surviving Shiny Happy People
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Have you watched Amazon's docu-series, "Shiny Happy People? In this episode I talk to Lindsey Williams who was proximately featured on the show but *plot twist*, we aren't talking about the documentary... at least not in ways it's been talked about before. We dive head first into the precise tactics Bill Gothard used on children and families to bring in millions of dollars for his benefit, how obedience was a performance to recruit other families, and the non-stop brainwashing we all experienced. Lindsey also addresses how she was chosen by Gothard, and ultimately how she was able to escape the IBLP grasp. Gifts of support (linked on my page) are always welcomed with gratitude! Want exclusive perks? Join the Anti-Cult Club for more cult content, personal nonsense, behind the scenes photos and funny moments with guests. :) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqfiV3C_ALO-kdynhhm876Q/join Fundie Facts: *The IBLP was also known for their training centers aka religious compounds which were highly funded by your favorite neighborhood craft store, Hobby Lobby and supported by large political figures like the Huckabee's and President Ronald Reagan. In the early 2000's, the IBLP brought in over 60 million dollars ($60,000,000) per year in revenue, largely in part to thousands of children providing free labor in addition to remodeling donated training centers. Other massive revenue streams include The Basic Seminar, Advanced Seminar, ATI (Advanced Training Institute), Character Curriculum, Embassy University (Disciplining Nations) and other IBLP materials/curriculum sold. You can connect with Lindsey and find other helpful resources here: https://linktr.ee/Cultchronicles If you'd like to share your own story on the podcast, send a description of your experience to kendraleebryan@gmail.com #cult #cultleader #cultsurvivor #iblp #ati# exfundie #exmo #exjw #rts #cptsd #religioustrauma #billgothard #shinyhappypeople

episodes.title: Are You Being Controlled By Cult-Leader Parents?
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Serious question for you today... Can you spot harmful control tactics in your relationships that mirror classic behaviors of cult leaders? Being in a controlling relationship with your family or a significant other comes at a major cost and can leave a profound and negative impact on your mental health, quality of life, and overall wellbeing. Unfortunately, it's easy to get sucked into the loop of repeating toxic relationship cycles we witnessed during childhood and as adults we find that those relationships can feel eerily similar. In this episode, I break down controlling and authoritarian cult behavior and demonstrate what it could look like in your every day life. Resources from this episode include Dr. Steven Hassan's BITE Model of Authoritarian Control which you can download for free on his website https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model/ and all other material used for this episode can be found below: https://www.thehotline.org https://www.watchmojo.com/articles/top-10-mind-control-techniques-used-by-cults https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2021/07/12/what-makes-a-cult-a-cult https://thriveworks.com/blog/psychological-coercion-dark-traits-emotional-safety-relationships/ Join my Anti-Cult Club channel to get access to exclusive perks and chaos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqfiV3C_ALO-kdynhhm876Q/join #cult #cultleader #cultbehavior #cultsurvivor #religioustrauma #childhoodtrauma #cptsd #ptsd #rts #exfundie #exjw #exmo #healthyrelationships #toxicfamily

Many classic cult tactics are tightly woven in the fabric of the Jehovah's Witness culture and Micki does a phenomenal job unpacking and clearly explaining just how manipulative and cohesive it is towards members. Since leaving the religion a few years ago, Micki has been an outspoken advocate against the harmful practices of the JW's which is incredibly MEANINGFUL work yet it receives a ton of backlash and hate from active group members. episodes.title: 2 Girls | 1 Cult {ft. Jessalyn G.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens- I hope your week was amazing! SUBSCRIBE for weekly episode and I'll love you forever and a day! You can watch the episode on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/vVYv1wo5jBk ----- It's been 20 FREAKING YEARS since I've seen or spoken to Jessalyn and we wasted no time breaking out some funny and traumatizing memories. You'll get to see an absolute blast from the past via OLD AF pictures of our youth that I found in the hidden vaults (the top of my closet under huge stacks of books). Jessalyn is a childhood friend and teammate from my homeschool volleyball days circa 2003-ish. We were both labeled as SUPER rebellious and told we were bad influences on the other girls. You'll be shocked at what we did to get those horrendous labels. We were raised in slightly different variations of a controlling fundamentalist group and I'm honestly so proud we both managed to escape and become the strong, outspoken, rebellious, and hilarious women we are today. Cheers to all the other Jezebels like us out there!

episodes.title: Unholy Secrets {ft. Jess S.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! On this episode I’m joined by my lovely and hilarious guest, Jess, who grew up in the Pentecostal Holiness church. Jess’ interview is packed full of wisdom, heartbreak, and many moments of humor as she recounts her own experience of growing up in an unsuspecting cult. She sheds light on many untold secrets and cover-ups that tarnished her youthful innocence and continue to impact innocent people in the Pentecostal Holiness Church. Our conversation left me feeling more inspired to live this life as a loud, proud, and free woman. 💜 Watch the episode on Youtube: https://studio.youtube.com/video/uqmtMYr9Njg/edit ---------------------------------- Resources mentioned in this episode: NYC area sliding scale therapy: www.safehorizon.org Nationwide sliding scale therapy: ▫️betterhelp.com ▫️try.talkspace.com DV/SA/CSA support hotline and chat: 🔺RAINN.org 800-656-HOPE

episodes.title: HBO: Let Us Prey {ft. Eric S. of the Preacher Boys Podcast}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Where are my fellow documentary peeps at?? You can watch "Let Us Prey: A Ministry of Scandals", on HBO Max or anywhere Investigation Discovery is playing. The 4 part docuseries follows the stories of several individuals who have left Independent Fundamental Baptist Churches. The victims have experienced horrific things while in them both as children and adults. The coverup and denial of their experiences has gone too far and for too long... You can watch the full episode on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/qE_8Lcma7Xg ----------------------- Eric Skwarczynski began his career as a professional videographer in 2013. Since then, his work has taken him across over 20 states and 13 countries, allowing him to develop into a skilled storyteller. Now, Eric is utilizing his talents and abilities to shed light on critical issues surrounding mental, physical, and sexual abuse within Independent Baptist Churches. His podcast, Preacher Boys, launched in January 2020, and has garnered nearly 2.5 million downloads, and the accompanying YouTube channel has accumulated 3,000,000+ views. Eric’s work has found its way into mainstream media, being featured on platforms like Peacock and the CBC. He was most recently featured in the four-part documentary series, Let Us Prey, which premiered on Investigation Discovery and hit #7 on the most-watched series on HBO Max. In addition to the success of Preacher Boys, Eric recently introduced a second YouTube channel, Film School’d – which features in-depth interviews with directors, actors, writers, Academy Award-winning FX artists, and other luminaries in the film industry. Casting Application: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfzlvQhC4mrFt09AC_lDcsLYlTNxNyOtiG_gA1vgBDW7N7_yQ/viewform Eric's Socials Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUnhn-4KoLWr0ffbPjMf-gQ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/preacherboysdoc/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/preacherboysdoc/ Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@preacherboyspod Twitter (X) https://twitter.com/preacherboysdoc Apple Podcasts:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/preacher-boys-podcast/id1493726980 Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5xZpDGKzOzjBuhRFUhFAM9?si=1d340858588f4054

episodes.title: Wicked Crimes {ft. Angela W.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Hope you're having a fantastic week! You can watch the full video on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/aUIWb3N3Ahs ___ As a young teenager, Angela was groomed by a former youth pastor and covert narcissist, now serving a life sentence. Unfortunately, Angela and several other young girls did not escape without life long scars including ptsd and religious trauma syndrome (rts) However, Angela and these other brave women are the reason he is behind bars which has protected so many others from his horrific crimes. We also dig into other things like how religious trauma can sneak up on you long after you've left the environment and the heavy truth that ALL church goers (past and present) need to hear. Angela did an absolutely beautiful job sharing her vulnerable story of pain, trauma, hope and healing. I am grateful she has shared it with all of us here. Go show your love and support to her by visiting Angela's super cute metaphysical IG shop: https://instagram.com/therestlessspiritvintage?igshid=MzMyNGUyNmU2YQ==

episodes.title: Pray The Gay Away {ft. Mekael J.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens, thanks for being here! In this episode of [Cult]ure Shock, I had the pleasure of speaking with Mekael J., an ex-Mormon woman who left the church at age 37 when she came out as gay. We had an eye-opening conversation about her journey to embracing her authentic self and leaving a religion that treats homosexuality as a sin and worthy of excommunication. We also dug into the challenges that come with recovering from religion including losing family, how to reparent yourself, and the feelings of isolation and loneliness often attached. Mekael shared many of her personal experiences with me while offering valuable advice for others in similar situations. This episode is a must-listen if you or someone you know is struggling with leaving a religion that no longer serves you/them. Follow Mekael on IG: @pearl_np88 Helpful resources: Suicide and Crisis Lifeline: Dial or Text 988 (Available for everyone for free, 24/7) Book Of Separation: https://www.amazon.com/The-Book-of-Separation-audiobook/dp/B076KST3HH/ref=sr_1_1?crid=36FNKGNNZJ675&keywords=book+of+separation&qid=1699474722&sprefix=book+of+separation%2Caps%2C123&sr=8-1 Embracing Uncertainty: https://www.amazon.com/Embracing-Uncertainty-Breakthrough-Methods-Achieving/dp/B07XB39KM1/ref=sr_1_1?crid=KCNJ03LLZ2KU&keywords=embracing+uncertainty&qid=1699474786&s=audible&sprefix=embracing+uncertainty%2Caudible%2C126&sr=1-1 How To Do The Work: https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/B092394734/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3L9CC7GYKX64F&keywords=how+to+do+the+work&qid=1699474819&s=audible&sprefix=how+to+do+the+work%2Caudible%2C117&sr=1-1 When Religion Hurts You: https://www.amazon.com/When-Religion-Hurts-You-High-Control/dp/B0CHDMFN4M/ref=sr_1_1?crid=JH5Q49WILYBB&keywords=when+religion+hurts+you&qid=1699474853&s=audible&sprefix=when+religion+hurts+you%2Caudible%2C124&sr=1-1 Complex PTSD Workbook: https://www.amazon.com/Complex-PTSD-Workbook-Mind-Body-Regaining/dp/B0849YRJ1X/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1K644SU3MPFEO&keywords=complex+ptsd+workbook&qid=1699474882&s=audible&sprefix=complex+ptsd+workbook%2Caudible%2C117&sr=1-1 Huberman Labs Podcast: https://www.hubermanlab.com/podcast Ketamine Episode: https://www.hubermanlab.com/episode/ketamine-benefits-and-risks-for-depression-ptsd-and-neuroplasticity The Science of Emotions and Relationships Episode: https://www.hubermanlab.com/episode/the-science-of-emotions-relationships LQBTQ Mormons, Families, and Friends: Affirmation.org Ready to Leave the Mormon Church: https://quitmormon.com

episodes.title: The Deadly Cost Of Biblical Faith
episodes.description:
Today on Culture Shock with Kendra, you’ll hear the powerful story of Shannon Au who was featured on Investigation Discovery's 'American Monster' in January 2023. Shannon endured spiritual abuse,  church hurt, and cptsd in the years leading up to  her mom’s brutal de*th in 2002. 

Shannon speaks out about the haunting memory of her mother's k*ller, who deliberately leveraged his position as a police officer and church leader to inflict years of physical and psychological tort*re on her and her family.

We will explore the details of the case and the potential early release of the ex-cop who was convicted of the m*rder. However, our main focus is on Shannon's story and the dangers of religious ab*se within churches and families and spiritual abuse healing. 

For more impactful stories like Shannon's and to stay up to date on new videos, hit subscribe! Thank you for supporting our voices.

If you or someone you know is experiencing DV or ab*se of any kind, there are resources to help. Believe victims and advocate for them.

The nationwide Hotline provides the following services:

• Crisis intervention
• DV education
• Safety planning
• Directly connects callers to Service Providers such as local shelters and provides referrals to agencies that provide legal, economic self-sufficiencyand other related services

You can reach the Hotline at 1-800-799-SAFE (7233) or TTY 1-800-787-3224 or (206) 518-9361 (Video Phone Only for Deaf Callers). The Hotline provides service referrals to agencies in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, & Guam.
Sources and Press:
American Monster "Gone Hunting", Season 9, Episode 10 on Discovery Plus and Amazon Prime

- https://www.kitv.com/news/big-island-ex-cop-serving-time-for-brutally-murdering-his-wife-could-be-set-free/article_bcac09be-55a8-11ed-8429-5b3f1f4802f8.html

- https://www.khon2.com/local-news/possible-new-minimum-sentence-for-former-cop/amp/

- https://www.westhawaiitoday.com/2022/12/09/hawaii-news/parole-board-sets-new-minimum-term-for-ex-cop-who-murdered-wife/amp/

episodes.title: Cult Survivor Reacts: Ruby And Kevin Franke’s Dangerous Parenting
episodes.description:
Kevin Franke’s attorney can’t stay out of the media in an attempt to paint his client as an innocent and “gentle” person.  
It’s a massive (& obvious) attempt to do damage control,but we see through the façade. Many don’t agree￼ that Kevin is as innocent and oblivious as his attorney wants you to believe. 

In this video, I take you through two media interviews with Kevin’s attorney, and show some information I found about in Kevin Franke’s history, which may prove he’s not so gentle after all. ￼
I give my perspective on Shari Franke’s relationship with both of her parents, how difficult it is to go no contact with your family, how the church should absolutely be held responsible, and how the dynamic  between a narcissistic parent and the complicent￼ parent can turn￼ volatile. ￼

It goes without saying that the opinions expressed here are my own and from my own personal experience of being raised in a highly religious family and in￼ a really similar parental dynamic. 



*On August 30th 2023, Kevin’s wife, Ruby, was arrested and charged with six counts of felony child abuse along side her business partner, Jodi Hildebrandt. 
 After the arrest people rightfully wanted to know where the children’s dad was, why he wasn’t arrested, and why he still does not have custody of the Franke’s 4 minor children.*


(Sorry for the audio pops!! I will do my best to have it fixed for next time, pinky promise!)
